docs.title: How to grep docker and docker-compose logs
docs.text:
docker-compose logs CONTAINER 2>&1 | grep "PATTERN"

docker logs CONTAINER 2>&1 | grep "PATTERN"

docs.title: Postgresql active queries
docs.text:
select query, now() - state_change, usename, pid, state, * 
from pg_stat_activity 
where state != 'idle' 
order by now() - state_change desc;
